tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gender_pay_gap_by_region (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR,
    male_employees_count INT,
    female_employees_count INT,
    median_male_salary DECIMAL,
    median_female_salary DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE company_pay_gap_data (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    pay_gap DECIMAL(10,2),
    industry_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industry_pay_gap_data(industry_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regional_pay_gap_data(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pay_gap_statistics (
	stat_id INT,
	industry_id INT,
	region_id INT,
	pay_gap DECIMAL(10,2),
	year INT
);

CREATE TABLE gender_stats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    industry VARCHAR(255),
    region VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    pay_gap DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    salary DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_efforts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    target_gender VARCHAR(10),
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);
